text: The incremental people properties are actually the ones that are easy to do...
skipping those doesn’t really help us
they may be under the impression that incremental people props are harder to do, so if it is in fact easier, i’m sure we’ll be able to just do that.
kat - when you’re done going through the doc let me know so they can address any comments you made
<@U06K2R98C>: can you add a link to this doc from a MixPanel card on Trello so we can easily reference it?
yup! i’ll do that right now
<@U051P3FPY>: I finished writing comments on that doc. Will you please review it and make sure that I did not miss anything?
I do have a few questions based on your comments. Do you have time to meet up?
also — i am meeting with the new mixpanel contact at noon today to chat, so if i could be there when you two talk about this (out of my meeting at 11:30), i would really appreciate that!
how does 11:30 work for everyone then?
works for me! see you two then
awesome be there in a sec
